FuncDef:
The tcp timer fin-timeout command sets a TCP FIN-Wait timer.
The undo tcp timer fin-timeout command restores the default value. The tcp timer fin-timeout command sets a TCP FIN-Wait timer. The undo tcp timer fin-timeout command restores the default value. By default, the value of the TCP FIN-Wait timer is 675 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the value of TCP FIN-Wait timer in seconds.
It is an integer ranging from 76 to 3600.

ExtraInfo: When the TCP connection status changes from FIN_WAIT_1 to FIN_WAIT_2, the FIN-Wait timer is enabled. If no FIN packet is received before the timeout of FIN-Wait timer, the TCP connection is terminated.
